# Project: Time Tracking CLI Tool

## Source of Truth

- Always prioritize the logic in `/doc/business-logic.md`.
- Database operations must respect constraints in `/doc/database-schema.md`.

## Workflow Rules

- **TDD First:** Do not generate implementation code until a failing test suite exists.
- **SDD First:** If a requirement is missing, ask me to update the docs before coding.
- **Tech Stack:** Node.js, ESM, Vitest, Commander.js.
